snippet: The move came because Washington stopped paying dues two years ago in protest over admission of the Palestinians as full members of the United Nations agency.
abstract: United States loses its voting rights at Unesco, two years after cutting off its financial contribution to the organization over the admission of Palestinians as full members; move undermines America's ability to exercise its influence in countries around globe through the United Nations agency's educational and aid programs.
lead_paragraph: The move came because Washington stopped paying dues two years ago in protest over admission of the Palestinians as full members of the United Nations agency.

headline.main: U.S. Loses Voting Rights at Unesco
headline.print_headline: U.S. Loses Voting Rights At Unesco

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
keywords.name: organizations
